column5: Remodeled 2b/2b in Long Island Village Outdoor Resort, minutes from SPI. Family-friendly environment with something for everyone: Indoor/outdoor pools and hot tubs, mini-golf and golf, billiards room, gym, sand volleyball, tennis and basketball courts and more! You'll also have access to the resort boat ramp and 24-hr Security.
column8: 2b/2b Very Spacious Home In Outdoor Resort!
